page.title: 15MELROSE "SEVENS"
page.content: Melrose Rugby Football club has its home at{"The Greenyards"}ground and was founded in {1877.}It is one of the foremost rugby clubs in the {Borders,} and several players have not only played their part in local rugby but have given to {Scotland's National {XV}some{fourteen}internationalists,who in total gained 175 caps. This is an outstanding contribution from a small town.In{1883 Adam Haig}introduced the {Rugby Sevens}for Melrose Sports Day. {Melrose Sevens Tournament}is now the most prestigious Sevens event and is held each June.In the most picturesque setting of the Greenyards, teams come from many rugby nations throughout world to compete.The town of{Melrose becomes very busy with thousands of visitors for this one day of the year. {Sevens}are so called because each team fields{7}players on a full size pitch.
